ITEM.NAME: Rise cake
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: milk, rise, sugar, eggs, candies. almond liqueur
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Beat the eggs with sugar, candies and liqueur
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil the milk and rise with grated lemon, salt and sugar. Cook everything in backing tin.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Golen and crisp server with some vanilla sugar on the top.

ITEM.NAME: Tenerina cake
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, milk, flour 00
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Beat the eggs yolks with sugar and flour. Beat the eggs whites with salt.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Melt chocolate with butter. Then mix with the eggs creams. Bake the cake 25-30min

ITEM.NAME: Castagnacci
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Heat the raisins in the water in spoon of vinsanto. Mix flour, salt, water adding the raisins and nuts.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Make 6x6cm cakes in the baking tin over and drizzled with oil. Cook for 25-30 min
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve topping with the remaining nuts.
